doc1.title: Python Programming Basics
doc1.content: Learn Python programming fundamentals including variables, functions, and control structures. Python is a versatile language great for beginners.

doc2.title: Data Science with Python
doc2.content: Explore data science concepts using Python libraries like pandas, numpy, and matplotlib. Analyze datasets and create visualizations.

doc3.title: Web Development Guide
doc3.content: Complete guide to web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build responsive websites and web applications.

doc4.title: Machine Learning Introduction
doc4.content: Introduction to machine learning concepts and algorithms. Learn about supervised and unsupervised learning techniques.

doc5.title: Database Design Principles
doc5.content: Learn fundamental database design principles, normalization, and SQL queries. Design efficient database schemas.

doc6.title: Food Safety Guidelines
doc6.content: Comprehensive food safety guidelines for restaurants and food service. Proper handling, storage, and preparation techniques.

doc7.title: Recipe Collection
doc7.content: Collection of popular recipes including appetizers, main dishes, and desserts. Step-by-step cooking instructions.

doc8.title: Nutrition Facts Guide
doc8.content: Guide to understanding nutrition facts and making healthy food choices. Information about vitamins, minerals, and dietary requirements.
